channel.title: [317] Project Rainbow [317]
channel.description:
[center] Information:
Forums: http://prserver.net/smf/index.php Client: http://prserver.net/smf/index.php?board=6.0 Wiki: http://yolocatz.com/pr/wiki/doku.php ---------------------------------------------------------------- About Project Rainbow: Project Rainbow is a 317 RSPS that has been around since early 2011. Some of our modellers have made loads of custom items so now we have over 400+ Custom items for you to enjoy! Current Owner Jack(Jek) has been applying updates for many months with help from Telenim and Whac so that we can give the players the best experience of an RSPS we can.
---------------------------------------------------------------- New Updates: [spoiler] Here is some of the newest updates that we have currently released! ---------------------------------------------------------------- On the 27th of November 2 new zones have been added into Project Rainbow.
-Rainbowian Zone x3: In PR we have a "Rainbow" themed zone that contains several Npcs that drop good items. After a few months of the Rainbowian x2 Zone being out, we have decided to add a brand new zone with more Npcs. The zone does cost a lot of money with in-game points and money but is really worth the grind! If you enjoy working hard to gain access to a zone, you will enjoy this!
-Luigis' Lair The zone contains Luigis, yes! Luigis! We like to ask members of the community what items and Npcs they would like to see that this is what they have chosen. We added a nice drop table of items you can obtain from it with also a small price to pay for the zone. [/spoiler]
---------------------------------------------------------------- Server Features: [spoiler] Here is a list of some of the few features we have to offer at PR! 400+ Obtainable customs Custom NPCs Custom AFK system Iron Man(Rewards for people who get maxed out) 100% construction - spawn any object your heart desires! Mature handpicked staff team Safe/unsafe PvP areas "Safe" gambling (handpicked hosts to minimize player scamming!) Implemented callback system for MSCP voting IRC <-> server communication IRC -> server integrated gambling Fully working highscores JavaScript embedded in client for custom commands! Max level 150 with 150 Capes! Constant 20-30+ players ... and much more! [/spoiler]
---------------------------------------------------------------- Pictures/Media: [spoiler] [img width=354 height=250]http://i64.tinypic.com/1zbx63q.png[/img] [img width=343 height=250]http://i58.tinypic.com/219o3ug.jpg[/img] *Funny custom items using a #name# system. Adding More soon...! [/spoiler]
Hope to see you around! [/center]

item.title: [317] Project Rainbow [317]
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Suggesting everyone to try it out, don’t judge the server by the spawn/home location.
Dive into the small/medium/high player community, it’s had during a few years there is no other community like this. There’s trolls, caring people, mature people you’ll find every kind of person at this servers community.
Many of the players who started years ago like me, find ourself having a hard time to ‘quit’ PR it has something special that keeps you coming back.

Join the server and maybe you’ll feel the PR vibe.
Correct wiki link: https://yolocatz.com/pr/wiki/doku.php

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Rainbow [317]
item.dc:creator: @D3i7y D3i7y
item.description:
@D3i7y wrote:

[quote=“MeeE59, post:6, topic:554052”][quote author=D3i7y link=topic=672975.msg4500329#msg4500329 date=1449693508]
I’m not trying to trash your thread but. why are you using a czar server? the interface that comes up looks like one from an old figment scape server. the island reminds me of the old server rune isle even the spawn is the same as well as the old new player has joined login.
[/quote]
Project Rainbow’s been around since 2010. It’s a Delta server. The interface that comes up, I can almost guarantee, is a normal interface found in 317 servers that has custom text and stuff. The newbie spawn area, I’ll admit, isn’t that great, and maybe it should be removed altogether.

i’m so confused is the a joke? to leave you must use the ::home command that takes you to a unique (very cool place) some of the walls have angel wings hanging out as if the client was a modified version of an old 08 client thati use to play on ages ago. the ip adress can be changed at the login screen agian like the basic setup of a delta scape or czar client.

It’s definitely not a joke. Many of the customs in the cache overwrite other models, and have for a loooong time. They could switch out the cache for a different one, but then several of the 800+ customs and their models would be deleted. As for the IP address being changeable at login, the thought behind that was from when No-IP’s nameservers were seized by Microsoft. We had to change our server IP nameserver from servequake to onthewifi.

the wiki isnt even on the same web host this isn’t a big issue it’s normal for rsps to do this for some reason. the name is yolocatz? this is not a big deal just confusing.

it looks like you mixed so many different features from old servers then added customs that where relased ages ago from moparscape archices from the modeling section for the large zipped files.

i’m very confused aside from the custom map once you type ::home it may have been used with toms cache editor? maby Lins cache editor? i have no idea…

Yolocatz (Ryan) is a friend of the server and offered his webhosting since the owner of the VPS PR is hosted on wasn’t as active as he could have been.

The models are ages old, and we’ve had them for ages.

The home area has changed several times over the past years, from Edgeville to Zanaris to the Dwarven Consortium to wherever it is now (it’s like a mansion place used in a quest that I’ve forgotten about since).

Anything else you need to know, just ask. I’ve been a member of Project Rainbow since 2011 and it is THE closest-knit internet family I’ve ever been a part of. Most people know each other by name, and I’ve even met a few of the players IRL. I’ve also been an owner of the server from 2013 to 2014 and it’s given me enough experience to start my own server, albeit a 718+, with a main feature being customs.[/quote]

thanks for clearing that up. i removed my post.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Rainbow [317]
item.dc:creator: @ImJek ImJek
item.description:
@ImJek wrote:

Sorry that forums were down for a few hours, we had issues with our vps but all should be up now!

item.title: [317] Project Rainbow [317]
item.dc:creator: @MeeE59 MeeE59
item.description:
@MeeE59 wrote:

I’m not trying to trash your thread but. why are you using a czar server? the interface that comes up looks like one from an old figment scape server. the island reminds me of the old server rune isle even the spawn is the same as well as the old new player has joined login.

Project Rainbow’s been around since 2010. It’s a Delta server. The interface that comes up, I can almost guarantee, is a normal interface found in 317 servers that has custom text and stuff. The newbie spawn area, I’ll admit, isn’t that great, and maybe it should be removed altogether.

i’m so confused is the a joke? to leave you must use the ::home command that takes you to a unique (very cool place) some of the walls have angel wings hanging out as if the client was a modified version of an old 08 client thati use to play on ages ago. the ip adress can be changed at the login screen agian like the basic setup of a delta scape or czar client.

It’s definitely not a joke. Many of the customs in the cache overwrite other models, and have for a loooong time. They could switch out the cache for a different one, but then several of the 800+ customs and their models would be deleted. As for the IP address being changeable at login, the thought behind that was from when No-IP’s nameservers were seized by Microsoft. We had to change our server IP nameserver from servequake to onthewifi.

[quote=“D3i7y, post:1, topic:554058”]the wiki isnt even on the same web host this isn’t a big issue it’s normal for rsps to do this for some reason. the name is yolocatz? this is not a big deal just confusing.

it looks like you mixed so many different features from old servers then added customs that where relased ages ago from moparscape archices from the modeling section for the large zipped files.

i’m very confused aside from the custom map once you type ::home it may have been used with toms cache editor? maby Lins cache editor? i have no idea…[/quote]
Yolocatz (Ryan) is a friend of the server and offered his webhosting since the owner of the VPS PR is hosted on wasn’t as active as he could have been.

The models are ages old, and we’ve had them for ages.

The home area has changed several times over the past years, from Edgeville to Zanaris to the Dwarven Consortium to wherever it is now (it’s like a mansion place used in a quest that I’ve forgotten about since).

Anything else you need to know, just ask. I’ve been a member of Project Rainbow since 2011 and it is THE closest-knit internet family I’ve ever been a part of. Most people know each other by name, and I’ve even met a few of the players IRL. I’ve also been an owner of the server from 2013 to 2014 and it’s given me enough experience to start my own server, albeit a 718+, with a main feature being customs.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project Rainbow [317]
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Ascalon:

Links doesn’t work?

Forums is probably down for some reason.

Awesome server been with it since early 2013, always something to do.
The server keeps receiving new updates and the owner is always on the look for something players want.

z:

How I imagine Lumbridge looks

Lumbridge isn’t really a part of the server, there’s a home place though.
The only thing you could find rainbow wise, will be certain items which have multiple colours or change colours.

item.title: [317] Project Rainbow [317]
item.dc:creator: @ImJek ImJek
item.description:
@ImJek wrote:

[center]
Information:

Forums: http://prserver.net/smf/index.php
Client: http://prserver.net/smf/index.php?board=6.0
Wiki: http://yolocatz.com/pr/wiki/doku.php

About Project Rainbow:
Project Rainbow is a 317 RSPS that has been around since early 2011.
Some of our modellers have made loads of custom items so now we have over 400+ Custom items for you to enjoy!
Current Owner Jack(Jek) has been applying updates for many months with help from Telenim and Whac so that we can give the players the best experience of an RSPS we can.

New Updates:
[spoiler]
Here is some of the newest updates that we have currently released!

On the 27th of November 2 new zones have been added into Project Rainbow.

-Rainbowian Zone x3:
In PR we have a “Rainbow” themed zone that contains several Npcs that drop good items. After a few months of the Rainbowian x2 Zone being out, we have decided to add a brand new zone with more Npcs. The zone does cost a lot of money with in-game points and money but is really worth the grind!
If you enjoy working hard to gain access to a zone, you will enjoy this!

-Luigis’ Lair
The zone contains Luigis, yes! Luigis!
We like to ask members of the community what items and Npcs they would like to see that this is what they have chosen. We added a nice drop table of items you can obtain from it with also a small price to pay for the zone.
[/spoiler]

Server Features:
[spoiler]
Here is a list of some of the few features we have to offer at PR!
400+ Obtainable customs
Custom NPCs
Custom AFK system
Iron Man(Rewards for people who get maxed out)
100% construction - spawn any object your heart desires!
Mature handpicked staff team
Safe/unsafe PvP areas
“Safe” gambling (handpicked hosts to minimize player scamming!)
Implemented callback system for MSCP voting
IRC <-> server communication
IRC -> server integrated gambling
Fully working highscores
JavaScript embedded in client for custom commands!
Max level 150 with 150 Capes!
Constant 20-30+ players
… and much more!
[/spoiler]

Pictures/Media:
[spoiler]

219o3ug.jpg771×561

*Funny custom items using a #name# system.
Adding More soon…!
[/spoiler]

Hope to see you around!
[/center]

Read full topic
